question: Which bank launched a national Hackathon for developers and students to come up with innovative ideas for the banking sector?
explanation: State Bank of India launched a national Hackathon for developers, start -ups and students to come up with innovative ideas and solutions for the banking sector. The hackathon has named 'Code For Bank'. The main aim to launch National hackathon is to come up with innovative ideas and solutions for the banking sector. It will start from June 6 and ends on June 20.
